clinical_study.brief_title: Drug-Drug Interaction Study to Assess the Effects of Multi Dose Clopidogrel on the Pharmacokinetics of Single-Dose K-877 in Healthy Adult Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to assess the effects of clopidogrel on the PK of K-877 in healthy adult subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Plasma exposure of K-877 by measuring Cmax when administered alone or with Clopidogrel
Plasma exposure of K-877 by measuring AUC when administered alone or with Clopidogrel

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of 20 participants with treatment emergent adverse events as assessed by the principle investigator
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion up to 17 days.
secondary_outcome.description: Subjects will be questioned in a general way by the investigator without specific symptoms suggested.
